Golden Ticket

What is this project about?

This is a community fundraiser to support creation of a blockchain developer coworking space and organizing an academic conference in Prague. Also, it's a chance to get a charity (ERC20) token with offline benefits!

What are the goals?

Social networking

Give away drink invitation as a way to meet the contributors and opportunity to say thanks!

Blockchain dev cowork

Build a place where anyone is welcome to work and share their blockchain projects.

Academic conference

Create an opportunity to present cross-field academic papers with blockchain as a key theme.

Charity

The project is non-profit and unused ETH is automatically send to Médecins Sans Frontières.

There are only 500 ToGs

Token of Gratitude (ToG) is a freely tradable ERC20 token expressing my appreciation of your contribution to the community

1 ToG = drink + (cowork + (conference)) + great feeling

ToG means more than my gratitude

The benefit of ToG grows with stretch goals.

  1. Whatever happens

    I'll invite you for a drink! Preferably once you show up in Prague ;)

  2. 10 000 USD = developer co-work hub

    You will get free entry for 1 year to the new co-work developer hub

  3. 25 000 USD = academic conference

    You will get a priority invitation to submit papers and/or entry discount for the conference

  4. Collected less or more = charity

    You can have even better feeling with every Wei raised as what's not used on the 1st or 2nd goal is automatically donated to Médecins Sans Frontières
The rewards are non exclusive so you will be entitled to all of them.

How much is needed?

100000 or 250000 USD respectively to achieve the goals. The complementary funds needed will be covered by sponsors or myself. The money will be used for the cause excluding my own reimbursement.

What's the token price?

ToG price is based on the amount of tokens left.

Only 500 ToG will be given away!

Amount of tokens ETH price
first 100 ToG 0.1
next 100 ToG 0.2
next 100 ToG 0.3
next 100 ToG 0.4
last 100 ToG 0.5

However every contributor regardless on the amount will be included into a draw for one special Golden ticket (Github)

How do you get your reward?

As soon as the fundraiser will be over, interface with a message field to create the hash will be available on the top of this page. Or you can just follow instructions on Github. Once you redeem the ToG, send me a message to tog@blockchainforthepeopl.com from the contact you used in the process. I'll check it's you and will send you the details.

Who is doing this?

Me, Josef .

I'm a student involved with couple startups and Prague Ethereum community organizer.

Find me here:

LinkedIn | Twitter | Github

Why am I doing this?

I always wanted to get these things done. It's a way to learn, to network and potentially give back to the community. The funds from the crowdfunding won't most likely cover the whole expense but making a simple small scale crowdfunding is a great way to get publicaly committed.

Why Médecins Sans Frontières?

I approached Doctors without borders (MSF) because of their neutrality and independence. I admire their work and I'm grateful for the service they provide to all humans without taking sides. Also, they already accept Bitcoin donations and they have great understanding of the technology, which made things much easier.

Where to head off next?

Give a feedback!

I'll be glad for any comments on Medium or Reddit.

Don't forget to checkout the code!

Contract was built on top of OpenZeppelin MintableToken + Crowdsale, uses Oraclize as a data feed and random number generator, Embark for deployment and handling and Infura for network connection. Thanks to all of the creators and contributors of those tools! It's all public on Github
